chatapp.utils

Class ChatRoom<Message,Sender>

  • java.lang.Object
    • chatapp.utils.ChatRoom<Message,Sender>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IChatroom, java.io.Serializable

    public class ChatRoom<Message,Sender>
extends java.lang.Object
implements IChatroom
    A concrete class that represents a single Chatroom object. A Chatroom object is simply a collection of IMsgReceiver stubs. Any IMsgReceiver stub is tied to the mini-MVC containing that Chatroom object on a remote user's system, and the IMsgReceiver may be used by the Chatroom object on the local user's system to communicate with the Chatroom object on the remote user's system.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
